/** Colors */
/** Font variables */
/** Mixins */
.component--embed-view--products--block-4 .viewsreference--view-title { color: #212121; font-family: "Merriweather Bold"; font-size: 1.5rem; margin: 3.5rem 0 2rem; }

.component--embed-view--products--block-4 .view-content { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; justify-items: center; grid-gap: 1.5rem; margin: 3rem 0; }

.component--embed-view--products--block-4 .view-content &gt; .views-row { border: 1px solid #F3F2F7; width: 100%; padding: 2rem; }

@media (max-width: 767.98px) { .component--embed-view--products--block-4 .view-content { display: block; margin: 2rem 0; }
  .component--embed-view--products--block-4 .view-content &gt; .views-row { border: 1px solid #F3F2F7; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; max-width: 100%; } }

.component--embed-view--products--block-4 .more-link { margin-top: 2rem; text-align: center; }

.component--embed-view--products--block-4 .more-link a { font-family: 'Lato'; font-weight: 400; border-radius: 2rem; border-style: solid; border-width: 1px; letter-spacing: 2px; padding: 0.5rem 3rem; text-decoration: none; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: calc(1rem * .03); word-spacing: calc(1rem * .03); background-color: #FFFFFF; border-color: #0071BC; color: #0071BC; display: inline-block; letter-spacing: 2px; padding: 0.5rem 5rem; position: relative; }

.component--embed-view--products--block-4 .more-link a:active, .component--embed-view--products--block-4 .more-link a .active, .component--embed-view--products--block-4 .more-link a .is-active { border-radius: 2rem; }

@media screen and (max-width: 576px) { .component--embed-view--products--block-4 .more-link a { letter-spacing: calc(0.75rem * .03); word-spacing: calc(0.75rem * .03); }
  .component--embed-view--products--block-4 .more-link a:not(.subscribe):not(.clear-filters) { width: 100%; } }

.component--embed-view--products--block-4 .more-link a:hover { border-color: #205493; color: #205493; }

.component--embed-view--products--block-4 .more-link a:active, .component--embed-view--products--block-4 .more-link a .active, .component--embed-view--products--block-4 .more-link a .is-active { border-color: #112E51; color: #112E51; }

.component--embed-view--products--block-4 .more-link a.disabled { border-color: #D6D7D9; color: #D6D7D9; }
